Jazz can be such a nuisance.
If only Simon's cat had a way to keep his space private and secure...
Well, maybe he can! With the help of today's sponsor... NordVPN.
VPN is a virtual private network that creates a secure connection to the Internet by masking both your
location and your identity. It is basically like having a magnetic cap flap for your data.
So no matter where you are, your personal data is safe from unwelcome paws. And when it comes to VPNs
Nord is by far the most secure, speedy, and reliable way to browse the Internet.
It has over 5,200 servers in 60 countries.
Combine that with double data encryption for increased security...
and you have an impenetrable fortress on your hands.
